00072 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 struct AttachmentInfo
00078 {
00079     AttachmentInfo()
00080         :   scene           (NULL)
00081         ,   attachToNode    (NULL)
00082     {}
00083 
00084     AttachmentInfo(aiScene* _scene, aiNode* _attachToNode)
00085         :   scene           (_scene)
00086         ,   attachToNode    (_attachToNode)
00087     {}
00088 
00089     aiScene* scene;
00090     aiNode*  attachToNode;
00091 };
00092 
00093 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 struct NodeAttachmentInfo
00095 {
00096     NodeAttachmentInfo()
00097         :   node            (NULL)
00098         ,   attachToNode    (NULL)
00099         ,   resolved        (false)
00100         ,   src_idx         (SIZE_MAX)
00101     {}
00102 
00103     NodeAttachmentInfo(aiNode* _scene, aiNode* _attachToNode,size_t idx)
00104         :   node            (_scene)
00105         ,   attachToNode    (_attachToNode)
00106         ,   resolved        (false)
00107         ,   src_idx         (idx)
00108     {}
00109 
00110     aiNode*  node;
00111     aiNode*  attachToNode;
00112     bool     resolved;
00113     size_t   src_idx;
00114 };

00155 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00158 struct SceneHelper
00159 {
00160     SceneHelper ()
00161         : scene     (NULL)
00162         , idlen     (0)
00163     {
00164         id[0] = 0;
00165     }
00166 
00167     explicit SceneHelper (aiScene* _scene)
00168         : scene     (_scene)
00169         , idlen     (0)
00170     {
00171         id[0] = 0;
00172     }
00173 
00174     AI_FORCE_INLINE aiScene* operator-> () const
00175     {
00176         return scene;
00177     }
00178 
00179     // scene we're working on
00180     aiScene* scene;
00181 
00182     // prefix to be added to all identifiers in the scene ...
00183     char id [32];
00184 
00185     // and its strlen()
00186     unsigned int idlen;
00187 
00188     // hash table to quickly check whether a name is contained in the scene
00189     std::set<unsigned int> hashes;
00190 };

00200 class ASSIMP_API SceneCombiner {

00203         // empty
00204     }
00205

00207         // empty
00208     }
